name: Paironormal Rivals
description:
An oculus quest game where three people play to catch ghouls.

The medium can sense and guide the ghoul hunters. The ghoul hunters must use their ghoulometers to locate and reveal the ghouls in the space around the medium. Once found the ghoul hunters can make the medium spirit away the ghoul with a concentrated spirit burst by pulling their ghoulometer triggers. 

Spirit burst - pull a trigger.

By Dem Dum Dåses
Brett Taylor
Niels Faaborg
Julian Hansen
Lau Maack-Krommes
